name: Anguish
text: Choose a target Phoenixborn. Its controlling player may discard 1 card at random from their hand. If they do not or cannot, place 2 wound tokens on that Phoenixborn. Then choose a target Phoenixborn. Its controlling player may move 2 dice of your choice from their active pool to their exhausted pool. If they do not or cannot, plate 2 wound tokens on that Phoenixborn.
